title: How to Find Rest in a Hustle Obsessed Culture ft. Ruth Chou Simons
description:
There's a blurred line between hustling and taking a break. We understand how unhealthy the hustling culture can be, so Ruth Chou Simons joined us to better understand the importance of slowing down and how to do it.  


Want to send Jeanine a message?  You can do that here: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy by clicking "Message."  


Support our podcast!  Visit: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy and click "Support!"
